dict.string: Access your gallery to select images to include in your notes, or save QR codes and images created in SecretNoteBox.
Access your gallery to select images to include in your notes, or save QR codes and images created in SecretNoteBox.
SecretNoteBox requires camera access to scan QR codes directly from your environment and to add images to your notes.
To enrich your notes, SecretNoteBox needs microphone access for recording audio memos.
